title: Magnetic materials - metallic bars far from magnet

content.question: After each trial, the permanent magnet is removed from the room where the experiment is done. With the permanent bar magnet now removed, the sensor would detect the presence of a magnetic field generated by which, if either, of the two metallic bars in trials <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> and <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> ?

choices.label: Neither the iron nor the aluminum bar
Both the iron and the aluminum bar

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
